subject: Tour of California (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: At the Tour of California, it will not be any easier for riders to run down the leader, Levi Leipheimer, than it will be for Floyd Landis to ride away from his past.
snippet: At the Tour of California, it will not be any easier for riders to run down the leader, Levi Leipheimer, than it will be for Floyd Landis to ride away from his past.
